title: 9 Easy Steps to Flip an Image in Google Docs

steps.title: Open a new document in Google Docs.
steps.content: Open a new document in Google Docs . Do this by clicking the + icon on the Google Docs homepage. [1] X Research source You can use Google Chrome , Safari, Mozilla Firefox , or another browser. If you aren't already logged in, click Sign in to do so now or create an account .

steps.title: Click Insert in the top toolbar.
steps.content: Click Insert in the top toolbar. This will be between View and Format . [2] X Research source

steps.title: Click Drawing, then New.
steps.content: Click Drawing , then New . You must insert the image using Google's Drawing tool to flip the image. [3] X Research source You can also click Drive if you want to upload an image from Google Drive .

steps.title: Click the image icon.
steps.content: Click the image icon. This is the square with two mountains inside. A new window will open. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Upload your image.
steps.content: Upload your image. You can drag-and-drop an image from your computer into the field or click Choose an image to upload to browse your files. You can also insert an image by URL, from your albums, or search. Once uploaded, your image should appear in the Drawing tool window.

steps.title: Click Actions.
steps.content: Click Actions . This can be found in the top-left corner of the Drawing window. A drop-down menu will open. [5] X Research source Make sure your image is selected. If it isn't, click it to see a blue edit border.

steps.title: Hover your cursor over Rotate.
steps.content: Hover your cursor over Rotate . A new menu will open. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Click Flip horizontally or Flip vertically.
steps.content: Click Flip horizontally or Flip vertically . [7] X Research source You can also right-click the image to access the edit menu.

steps.title: Click Save and Close.
steps.content: Click Save and Close . This is the blue button in the top-right of the window. Your flipped image will be added to your document. You can also move the image or rotate the image .
